radiographic_examinations.findings: Macular pigmentary changes, linear pigmentary changes, subtle macular pigmentary changes, and peripheral scalloped atrophic areas.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased SW-AF abnormalities slightly more evident than at first visit after four years.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Hyperpigmented lines radiating from fovea, macular atrophy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Eighteen years later, visual acuities decreased with marked macular atrophy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Foveal atrophy and pigmentary mottling of the macula.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Visual acuities recorded as 20/80 (right) and 20/200 (left) at the latest visit aged 79.
